mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Has perused the enclosed; interested in anything contributing to growth of city, under which term he includes Georgetown; appears to be a sane method of connecting land into a circulating medium by a proper representative, divided into smaller and more convenient transfers; mentions Baltimore company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1803 October 20, Washington [D.C.] to Benjamin Stoddert, n.p.
